keyMappings:
map s LinkHints.activateMode
map S LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
map H previousTab
map L nextTab
unmap J
unmap K
map <c-o> goBack
map <c-i> goForward
map <c-f> scrollFullPageDown
map <c-b> scrollFullPageUp
unmap o
unmap O 
map <space><space> Vomnibar.activateInNewTab 
map <space>ff Vomnibar.activateInNewTab 
map <space>fF Vomnibar.activate  
unmap T
map <space>sb Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
unmap x
map <space>bd removeTab
map <space>sk showHelp
unmap b
unmap B
map <space>sm Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab
map <space>sM Vomnibar.activateBookmarks 
map <space>bl closeTabsOnLeft
map <space>br closeTabsOnRight
map <space>bo closeOtherTabs
map <space>bb visitPreviousTab
unmap >>
unmap <<
map [B moveTabLeft
map ]B moveTabRight
unmap <a-p>
map <space>bp togglePinTab
unmap t
map <space>fn createTab
map f LinkHints.activateModeToDownloadLink
map <c-d> scrollPageDown
map <c-u> scrollPageUp
nextPatterns: 下一封,下页,下一页,下一章,后一页,下一张,next,more,newer,>,›,→,»,≫,>>
previousPatterns: 展开阅读全部,上一封,上页,上一页,上一章,前一页,上一张,prev,previous,back,older,<,‹,←,«,≪,<<
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s 必应
bd: https://www.baidu.com/s?ie=utf-8&wd=%s 百度
bili: https://search.bilibili.com/all?keyword=%s 哔哩哔哩
gh: https://github.com/search?q=%s  GitHub 仓库
lc: https://so.szlcsc.com/global.html?k=%s 立创商城
zh: https://www.zhihu.com/search?type=content&q=%s 知乎
